caption.p: Purification of NVCP from N. benthamiana plants. Leaf protein extract was purified and analyzed on a 4–20 % SDS-PAGE gel under reducing condition. Lane 1 insect cell-produced NVCP as a reference standard, Lane 2 clarified leaf extract from uninfiltrated plants, Lane 3 clarified leaf extract from NVCP-producing plants, Lane 4 supernatant of low-pH precipitation, Lane 5 purified plant-derived NVCP from DEAE anion-exchange chromatography. ◄: RuBisCo large and small subunits; ←NVCP (Adapted with kind permission from Springer Science + Business Media: Plant Cell Reports, Lai and Chen [ 126], Fig. 5)
